original_title: The We Like Girls Project: Volume 3
overview: Lexi Lore and Harmony Wonder have known each other for over a decade. Although life has physically kept them apart throughout the years, their bond has always remained strong. Now they'll FINALLY be able to express the love they have for each other in a way they've never done before... by going to prom!  "We met on set, actually," Dee answered when we asked how she and Syren first met. "She walked into the green room, I didn't know I was working with her, and I was like, who is THAT??" "We kind of felt a connection right from the beginning, but we had just met," Syren followed up with. They went on to describe how intensely they fell for each other from the get-go, with Dee admitting that even her ex-husband didn't look at her the way Syren did!
title: The We Like Girls Project: Volume 3
